summary: This document is a Sexual Offender Registration Form from the Virgin Islands Department of Justice, detailing the requirements for registered sex offenders, including obligations to report changes in residence and travel. It specifically mentions Jeffrey Epstein as a registrant and outlines the legal implications of failing to comply with registration requirements.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is identified as a registrant on the Sexual Offender Registry, having been convicted of procuring a minor for prostitution.

events.title: Conviction for Procuring a Minor
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein was convicted of procuring a minor for prostitution.

events.title: Notification of Duty to Report
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein was advised of his duty to report any changes in temporary lodging and travel outside the U.S. Virgin Islands.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein is registered as a sex offender in New York.
The document outlines the legal obligations for sex offenders regarding travel and residence changes.
Failure to comply with registration requirements can lead to criminal prosecution and significant penalties.
